name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
description: Provides free skill training and certification to youth to improve employability.

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
description: Supports agricultural innovation, training, and entrepreneurship among rural youth.

name: Udyam Registration Scheme
description: Supports small business registration and access to loans and subsidies.
